name: 60 Seconds (bubbaerikson)
description:
60 Seconds is a minimalist platformer inspired by the one minute game jam.

Traverse your way through each level opening doors and using jump pads to reach the end within 60 seconds. 

CONTROLS

A - Move left

D - Move right

Up - Jump

R - Resets the level

Q - Main menu

Can you make it through within 60 seconds?

This game was made using the Godot Game Engine, Beepbox for the music and JSFXR for the SFX.
